text:

title: Music+ Resource Pack
text:
This pack makes some changes to how the in-game music plays. People who enjoy listening to Minecraftâ€™s music will find this pack improves the way Minecraft music works! Perfect for anyone who want a more pleasurable experience while playing the game.

# Universal Features

The following are features which are universal / global. Meaning, they affect all pack options.

â€¢ Music plays constantly with no silent periods
â€¢ All songs play at 0.5 volume
â€¢ Shuniji, Dragon Fish, and Axolotl from Java Edition have been added
â€¢ Creative, Survival, Menu, and Water music plays interchangeably
â€¢ End and Boss play interchangeably
â€¢ Dog plays after the Cat music disc (Easter egg from Console Edition)
â€¢ Music disc music will still play from the jukebox regardless of setting chosen below

# Pack Options

There are multiple different pack options. Each one includes different features and music tracks.

â€¢ Default â€“ This is the normal setting for the pack with all the features listed above.
â€¢ No Water Music â€“ This is the exact same as Default, but without Shuniji, Dragon Fish, or Axolotl.
â€¢ Old Music â€“ This uses the music from before the 2013 Music Update. It doesnâ€™t use Creative, Water, Nether, End, Credits, or Menu music.
â€¢ Old Music+ â€“ This is almost the same as Old Music, the difference being that it still uses Nether, End, and Credits music.
â€¢ Total Mix â€“ This lets any music, including Credits, End, Boss, Nether, Water, Menu, Survival, and Creative play at any time.

You can switch pack by going to Global Resources in Settings and pressing the Gear icon.


# How to activate it

â€¢ Download and install the resource pack
â€¢ Activate the pack you installed in your world settings or global settings (Settings > Global resources)

title: Vanilla Vehicles Addon (v3)
text:
This addon implements 11 modern vehicles and it includes everything from cars to a flyable helicopter. All vehicles are designed in a style to stay true to the original Minecraft graphics which makes them a great addition to the game experience.

# How does it work?

The horses have been replaced by six new vehicles and can be bought from the new villager type called Mechanics. Driving works just the same as riding a horse. Equip the vehicle with a key to be able to control it.

â€¢ Long press on the vehicle
â€¢ Or press the "Drive" or "Fly" button that appears when you are near the vehicle.
â€¢ Equip it with a key to control it.

# Minecar

â€¢ This vehicle is the fastest land vehicle of them all.
â€¢ You can customize it with stickers and use cauldrons to dye the Color Overlay Minecar Stickers.
â€¢ To start driving youâ€™ll need to equip the car with a key.

# Minemarine

â€¢ This vehicle is designed for underwater driving.
â€¢ Equip the car with a key to start the engine and be able to start driving.

# Mineplane

â€¢ Add a key to the airplane inventory and start moving up and remove the key to go down.

# Miniminecar

â€¢ This is basically a miniature version of the Minecar.
â€¢ Itâ€™s much smaller and slower but it can jump!

# Minebus

â€¢ This vehicle can seat up to five players at the same time.
â€¢ The first player riding it will be the one controlling the vehicle and the others will be passengers.

# Minebikes

â€¢ The Minebikes are quite fast and have seats for two players per vehicle.
â€¢ Two players can ride together on one bike.
â€¢ Equip it with a key to control it.

# Minetrain

â€¢ This is a combination of multiple entities (Cart & Engine). Place down the engine then consecutively place down the carts and they will connect!
â€¢ Replaces Skeleton (Cart) and Husk (Locomotive)

# Dotto Minetrain

â€¢ Works like the Minetrain, but it has a different look & itâ€™s bigger
â€¢ Replaces Pig (Cart) and Cow (Locomotive)

# Minecopter

â€¢ Add the key to fly up, and take the key out to fly down. Also, the propellers spin!
â€¢ Replaces Zombie Villager

# RC Cars & Controllers

â€¢ Added RC Cars & Controllers (New Behavior) Charge them with a battery & and use controllers like snowballs to define where the cars go.
â€¢ Replaces Stray (Red RC Car) and Wither Skeleton (Blue RC Car)

# Minekart

â€¢ The fastest ground vehicle of them all, sprayable like a sheep!
â€¢ Replaces Sheep

# Props

â€¢ Traffic cones, traffic lights, street lights, flags & more!
â€¢ They replace all the mob heads.

# What's new in v3?

â€¢ Minebike recipe has been updated
â€¢ Minebike has an updated look
â€¢ Motorcycle now drops itself.
â€¢ Grass Block Sticker now works
â€¢ Minebike: fixed part-invisible chest
â€¢ Added Minetrain
â€¢ Added Dotto Minetrain
â€¢ Added Minecopter
â€¢ New behavior & new look for Mineplane
â€¢ Added RC Cars & Controllers
â€¢ Added Minekart
â€¢ Added Props (e.g. traffic cones, street lights and more)
â€¢ New behavior for Minemarine
â€¢ Vehicles no longer drop XP and they have a smoother animation when killed
â€¢ New sounds for the new vehicles

# Credits

â€¢ New "How to Play" UI made by solvedDev

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the behavior and resource pack
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings

text:
With this addon villagers can now walk safe in their village.
All zombies (including babies, regulars and zombie villagers) are no longer interested in villagers.
Villagers will also no longer turn into witches.

# New Villager

â€¢ Replaces cleric/priest villager

title: Controllable Airplane Addon
text:
This add-on adds a fully controllable airplane in Minecraft.

# How to board an airplane?

Summon the iron golem (Airplane) first, then get close to it and press the "Mount" button. Or long press on the airplane.
Then place the key (carrot on a stick) in the first airplane inventory slot.

# How to control an airplane?

Please note that to control the airplane, set the game difficulty to Easy, Normal, or Hard, and set the game mode to Survival.

â€¢ Green Arrow Up (Lime Dye) â€“ Hold the green arrow to fly up
â€¢ Red Arrow Down (Red Dye) â€“ Hold the red arrow to fly down
â€¢ Hold none of the arrows to fly straight forward
â€¢ Place the Blue Arrows (Heart of the Sea) inside the 2nd slot of the airplane inventory to double the horizontal speed
â€¢ Remove the key from the airplane in case that you just want to drive around
â€¢ Place the Ghost (Diamond Horse Armor) inside the 3rd slot of the airplane inventory to add Ghost mode. Fly through blocks! But be careful, it can get quite dangerous! Itâ€™s recommended to place the item only inside the slot while flying, or else the plane will just fly out of the world.
â€¢ If the Key is inside the Plane and you suddenly can\â€™t fly anymore, put the key out and in again, to fix it.
â€¢ To remove the plane, hold a Stick and tap on the Plane. Now you have 1 Second to tap again on the Plane to remove it, otherwise the Removing Process will reset.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings

title: Alien Warfare Texture Pack (v2)
text:
This texture pack is great for space themed maps in Minecraft. It includes over 70 space themed custom textures for all weapons and tools, ladders, signs, a couple of mobs, and a few blocks.
The ladders and signs are made to look more like modern metal textures. The weapons are totally epic, with custom colors and shapes. There is even a phaser that shoots plasma bolts! Not to mention the shovels and hoes have been customized. There are two mobs with custom alien textures. 
If that is not enough, there is even a custom made spacesuit. The entire set of diamond armor has been rebuilt to look like a Minecraft spacesuit. So if you want to build sweet space stations and stuff, download the Alien Warfare Pack.

# Alien Warfare Pack feature guide:

â€¢ A sweet custom space suit. (Diamond Armor)
â€¢ Custom passive and aggressive mobs like the one eyed Martian cow or the Happy Warlock.
â€¢ All weapons and tools are customized, including a phaser blaster.
â€¢ Space themed glowstone and sea lantern blocks.
â€¢ Colorful villagers from all over the universe.
â€¢ Custom blocks with control panels and unique designs.

â€¢ Added universal villagers
â€¢ And more!

â€¢ Activate the resource pack in your world settings

title: Jimbos Modern Weapons Add-on (v9)
text:
This addon upgrades some of the low-tech tools to modern standard weapons. 

# Features

â€¢ Shotgun (fishing rod)
â€¢ Missile Launcher (bow)
â€¢ Fire Grenade (snowball)
â€¢ Grenade (egg)
â€¢ Soldiers (skeletons) : Tameable with bow
â€¢ Landmine (creepers) 
â€¢ Turret (iron golem)
â€¢ Tank (Wither Skeleton)
â€¢ Mech Mob (Husk)

# Tank

Before you can drive it you will need to fill it up with some coal. The coal works as fuel and will last for 3 minutes before you need to refill it again. While seated on the tank you can hold a key in your hand to control the direction of the tank.

# Landmine

Landmine will detonate if a player (cow, pig, rabbit) is within a radius of 1.5 blocks of the object.

# Mech Mob

To ride the Mech Mob you will first need to refill it with some coal. Once thatâ€™s done the Ride button will appear and you will be able to seat it. The coal fuel lasts four 3 minutes until it needs to be refilled again.

# Missile Launcher

You can activate a zoom function by sneaking while holding the weapon.

# Binocular

The Binocular is an item which you can use for viewing things at a far distance. Itâ€™s dropped by skeletons and has a very low drop loot (0.025). You can also use the following text command to obtain the item: /give @p yellow_flower 1 1

Hold the Binocular item and sneak to activate the zoom function. You canâ€™t walk or move while the Binocular zoom is active.

# What's new in v9?

â€¢ Added Binoculars (Custom Item)
â€¢ Added zoom function for the missile launcher

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install both behavior and resource pack
â€¢ Activate the packs you installed in your world settings

title: Better Drops Addon (v2.7.6)
text:
With this add-on, mobs drop more realistic and improved loot, while still being balanced. For example, chickens, pigs, and cows now drop their bones. Villagers and witches drop leather (their clothing). All of this is in addition to lowered chances for all mob drops (ALL!). Enjoy this add-on!

â€¢ Creepers, skeletons, zombies, and players can drop their head!
â€¢ Witches drop can drop a potion!
â€¢ Fixed blazes, wither boss, ghasts, and more!
â€¢ All drops have heavily lowered chances!
â€¢ More hidden balancing!

and many more!

title: Attraction Minecart Addon Vol.2
text:
This is the second version of the Attraction Minecart add-on. This add-on changes the speed of the minecart according to a specific game rule.

The following two minecarts have been changed.

â€¢ Minecart=Fast (Hopper Minecart)
â€¢ Minecart=Slow (Normal Minecart)

If '/gamerule dotiledrops false', the speed of minecarts changes to normal.
If '/gamerule dotiledrops true', Minecart=Fast (Hopper Minecart) speeds up and Minecart=Slow (Normal Minecart) slows down.

Watch the YouTube tutorial video below to better understand the features of this add-on.

Previous version: Attraction Minecart Vol.1

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack you installed in your world settings

Artists at Mojang have worked on the new textures for months but today is the first time that you will be able to download the official release and try out the new textures for yourself (on Java Edition). This is a port from Java Edition to Bedrock Edition, and that means it does include some bugs.

# What's new in this update?

â€¢ Deleted new bed textures (they were messed up)
â€¢ Invisible zombies fixed

# Creator

â€¢ Jappa

â€¢ Download and install the resource pack
â€¢ Activate the pack you installed in Settings (Settings > Global resources)

title: Lockable Chests Addon
text:
This addon replaces the iron golem with a lockable chests. This chest works the same as a normal chest, but has the feature that it can be locked.

# How can I lock Chests?

Chests are open for anyone, till you lock it with a Key. Keys replace the Carrot on a Stick. Tap on the Interact Button while holding the Key to lock the Chest.

# What happens, if the Chest is unlocked?

If the Chest is unlocked, you can push it around to get it to the place, where you want it. Anyone can open the Chest and the content is not protected from Griefers. The Chests can also be removed by everyone.

# What happens, if the Chest is locked?

If the chest is locked, you canâ€™t push it around anymore and it will stay at its place. It wonâ€™t be affected by gravity and only the Owner of the chest is able to open it.The chest can only be removed by the Owner or a Player in Creative Mode.

# How can I remove the Chest?

Chests wonâ€™t take damage by anything. The only way to remove it, is by holding a Stick in your hand and tapping on it. You will get the content of the Chest back.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install both behavior and resource pack
â€¢ Activate the packs you installed in your world settings

title: More Potions Addon
text:
This add-on introduces new custom potions. Discover 8 brand unique and brand new potions all sold by a new villager called Brewer.

# How to obtain the new potions?

The potions can be obtained by trading with a new village called Brewer. You can create the new brewer villager by giving a cauldron to a villager. Make sure to not open his trading inventory before the transformation, otherwise you are going to loose some trades. 
Or you can simply type the following commands.

â€¢ /give @p yellow_flower 1 [1-8]

# How does it work?

You consume a custom potion by holding it. While you have an active custom potion effect on you, you cannot apply another effect. You can however refresh the duration of the effect by consuming the same potion a second time. After consuming a potion, it turns into a empty bottle (due to a Minecraft bug the inventory doesnâ€™t update correctly, clicking a block fixes it).

â€¢ Health Boost Potion (+20 hearts)
â€¢ Super Speed Potion (+0.4 speed)
â€¢ Gravity Potion (No gravity)
â€¢ Feather Potion (No fall damage)
â€¢ Knockback Potion (No knockback)
â€¢ Attack Damage Potion (+7 damage)
â€¢ Magic Potion (No damage through potions)
â€¢ Wither Potion (No wither effect damage)

* This addon is not compatible with the More Totems Addon, Astronomic Expansion Addon and most likely any other item adding addon.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings

title: Gravity Control Addon (v0.4.2)
text:
With this add-on, players can control their own gravity. You can also use a block called Gravity Buff to take a buff and raise you high.

# Gravity Modes

There are three different gravity modes. You switch mode by pressing the sneak button.

â€¢ Ordinary (normal mode)
â€¢ Reduce gravity (50%)
â€¢ Reduce gravity (100%)

# Gravity Buff

Gravity Buff looks exactly like Ender Crystal, but its usage is quite different.
When you walk into Gravity Buff, your gravity will reduce and you will rise in the air.
If you want to find Gravity Buff, the following command will help.

â€¢ /execute @r[type=ender_crystal] ~ ~10 ~ tp <playername> ~ ~ ~

Tap the pictures below to preview how it works.

# What's new in v0.4.2

â€¢ Added Gravity Buffs, Bug fixes

# What's new in v0.2

â€¢ Added three different gravity modes - sneak to switch

â€¢ v0.3 : Three modes to switch + Gravity Buffs
â€¢ v0.2 : Three modes to switch

Legacy Pack is a resource pack that makes it more similar to Java Edition.

# In-game Textures

â€¢ Water now looks more like Java Edition
â€¢ Removed mip map levels to make it feel more like Java
â€¢ Tweeked Sugar cane texture
â€¢ Added Boat sounds (paddle land and paddle water)
â€¢ Changed Rain sounds
â€¢ Added Squid Sounds (ambient.in.water, hurt.in.water and death.in.water)
â€¢ Added mob.slime.attack sound
â€¢ Added mob.magmacube.jump sound
â€¢ Tweaked Cauldron, Chests, Doors sounds

# User Interface

â€¢ New Inventory UI (creative, survival, crafting)
â€¢ New Start, Pause
â€¢ New Chat Screen
â€¢ New HUD
â€¢ New Progress Screen
â€¢ New Settings Sections
â€¢ New World Settings Sections
â€¢ New World Create Sections
â€¢ New World Edit Sections
â€¢ New Toast Screen

# Creator

â€¢ Twitter: @HawfHuman, @OSprintermax, @crizartex

# How to activate it

â€¢ Download and install the resource pack
â€¢ Activate the pack you installed in Settings (Settings > Global resources)

This add-on will implement this same character in your Minecraft world (by replacing the Witch). And you can even tame him and have him fight for you.

# Features

â€¢ Wild Uganda: only hostile if you attack him

â€¢ Tamed Uganda: Attacks monsters / Healable with any of the following items

â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings

title: Modern Tools Add-on (v2.0)
text:
This addon adds a bunch modern tools to Minecraft and they replace just two different mobs. For example, one of the tools is a fridge which you can use for storing your food (or any other items) and another tool lets you cook your raw food items in an instant on a kitchen stove. Besides using them for their various tasks you can also use them for decorating your worlds as they are essentially new types of furniture.

# How to create them?

â€¢ Spawn shulker where you want.
â€¢ Or if you throw an egg (forge), the shulker will spawn there.
â€¢ Then use the following items with the shulker.
â€¢ Tap the picture below to preview how it will be created.

# Items (Tools)

â€¢ Fridge (Gray Dye): A storage container with 27 available slots.
â€¢ Tables/Chairs (Bone Meal, Light Blue Dye, Rose Red, Lapis Lazuli, Pink Dye, Cocoa Beans): Can sit on the chairs
â€¢ Kitchen Stove (Light Gray Dye): Cook food instantly.
â€¢ Forge (Shulker): Add coal to the forge and retrieve a random valuable item
â€¢ Dump (Ink Sac): Trash bin. You can discard unnecessary items in survival mode.
â€¢ PC (Lime Dye): Use a PC to trade ingots for coins.

# Others

â€¢ Postman (Villager): He lets you access the MineBay market where you can buy and sell all kinds of items.
â€¢ Coin (Emerald): Can be used for trading with a Postman

# How to remove them?

â€¢ Hit them until they are gone

# What's new?

â€¢ New beds with models
â€¢ Bug fix when making the tools

title: T+S Hardcore Addon (Updated)
text:
The TS Hardcore Addon aims to make Minecraft in hard mode survival even more difficult than what it already is by increasing the underwater breathing limits and drastically change the attack damage for both the player and mobs in-game. Letâ€™s see how long you can survive..

# Features

â€¢ Donâ€™t go for any long swimming adventures. You will now drown much quicker underwater.
â€¢ You can no longer hit mobs with just your hands.
â€¢ All of the mobs have had their attack damage doubled.

Recommended: We highly recommend to set the difficulty to hard to take advantage of some of the built-in difficulty features in Minecraft as well as those in this addon.

# What's new?

â€¢ Max player XP level is now set to 40
â€¢ Zombie, Wither Skeleton, Zombie Pigman and Zombie Villager are all much faster
â€¢ Mobs drop less loot

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the behavior pack
â€¢ Activate the behavior pack you installed in your world settings

â€¢ Added The Breathing Helmet (Replaces Steve Head): Prevents drowning damage, itâ€™ll seem as if youâ€™re drowning, but youâ€™re not
â€¢ Added Evil Snow Admin (Replaces The Witch): Shoots iceballs or snowballs in addition to a melee attack

Minecraft: Story Mode is basically a point-and-click adventure game which is based on Minecraft but with a more in-depth story. title: Protective Turrets Addon (v2)
text:
This addon replaces shulkers with powerful turrets.
There are 6 different turrets, each equipped with a unique weapon.

# Types

â€¢ Purple Turret (default) - Shulker Projectiles

You can transform a purple turret by using the items below.

â€¢ Blue Turret (Lapis Lazuli) - Arrows
â€¢ Yellow Turret (Dandelion Yellow) - Thunder Snowballs
â€¢ Green Turret (Lime Dye) - Fireballs
â€¢ Black Turret (Ink Sac) - Wither Skeleton Skull
â€¢ Pink Turret (Pink Dye) - Healing XP Potions

Hold one of the dyes above and drag it to the purple turret and tap the "Transform" button.

# Update Turrent

â€¢ Step 1 : Gunpowder
â€¢ Step 2 : Diamond

Hold the item above and drag it to the turret, then press the "Update" button.

# What's new in v2?

Recommendation: Due to the new models itâ€™s recommended that low-end users donâ€™t place down too many turrets in one place.

â€¢ New design for turrets
â€¢ Bug fixes


# How to install

This add-on replaces the End with new dimension called the Aether.
The way to enter the Aether is the same as entering the End.

â€¢ Find an activated portal in a stronghold.

To build the portal, you need End Portal blocks ans 12 Ender eyes.
In this add-on, the blocks and items for building a portal are changed as follows.

â€¢ Eye of Ender = Aether Portal Key

If you are in the Aether dimension, you can meet new mobs such as Auther Guard (Wither Skeleton) and Aether Dragon (Ender Dragon).

* New items did not replace any existing items.

Enjoy the new dimension!

title: Multi Construct Add-on
text:
Cheeteâ€™s Multi Construct Add-on

The Multi Construct Add-on implements 20+ new blocks in-game using the empty tileData numbers. It includes blocks such as Dacite, Netherstone, Stone Pathways and many others. If youâ€™re looking for news ways to decorate your worlds then this add-on is a great option for you.

# How to obtain the new blocks?

You can use the following command format in-game to retrieve a specific block type:

/give @a [block, e.g. stone] [amount] [data value]

Hereâ€™s a real example in which I demonstrate how to obtain 64 Copper Blocks:

/give @a prismarine 64 8

# How to get it?

You can get the Magic Spy Glass item by fishing, or by using the following text command in creative mode: 

â€¢ /give @s yellow_flower 1 1.

There is also a chance that stronghold chests contain them.

# How to use it?

If you walk close to a block while holding this new item you can see through it and any connected blocks. This means that you have an easy way to find caves, ravines and other underground structures. You cannot find ores through this way though.

title: Super Loot Addon (Update 3)
text:
This addon changes most of the aspects related to loot in Minecraft and mostly for the better. 

Loot, meaning items dropped by mobs when killed, have been improved for most of the in-game hostile mobs.
But this also comes with changes to mob behaviors to make their powers balanced to their new loot.

There are 6 separate editions.

# Basic Edition

â€¢ Skeletons work similar to lucky blocks. They are still able to attack and they have more health.
â€¢ Zombies are faster, stronger and cause more damage but they drop very valuable items.
â€¢ Spiders are extremely strong and can one-shot players. But they have have the chance to drop an enchanted item if killed.
â€¢ Endermen have a 5% chance to drop an enchanted book.
â€¢ he ender dragon has also had a massive health boost but that also comes with the ender dragons fireball is changed to a regular fireball.
â€¢ Most naturally generated chest have had a loot buff
â€¢ Villagers have a health boost and they also got much better trades
â€¢ Cows, horses, pigs, rabbits and polar bears drop items similar to that of chickens

# Defensive Edition

â€¢ Wolves have godly powers. 15 times more health, 10 times more damage and they can attack from 6 blocks away. They are also faster. However, you canâ€™t tame them with bones â€“ now you will need rotten flesh which is a rare drop from zombies from here on. They can be healed with Enchanted Goldens apples and can only be bred with diamond blocks and rotten flesh.
â€¢ Player has double health and can breathe longer underwater
â€¢ The snow golem and iron golem have had a massive health boost.
â€¢ The shulker is now stronger aswell as having a damage boost, defending the player, and affecting slowness as apossed to levitation
â€¢ The ender pearl, snowball, egg, arrow, and xp bottle no longer have gravity, eggs spawn lightning on hit, and xp bottles have been massivly buffed
â€¢ Horses are faster, have more health have the ability to jump higher

# Special Edition

â€¢ Chickens summon the skeleton.
â€¢ The Chicken has 1200 hearts and is faster.
â€¢ Drops many valuable items (like diamonds, emeralds, gold ingot)

# Nether Edition

â€¢ Blazes are a lot stronger and have a 1 in 3 chance to drop an enchanted book
â€¢ Endermites are significantly stronger and can drop a diamond, emerald, iron ingot, or gold ingot
â€¢ Ghast are stronger and can drop emeralds
â€¢ The wither has had a massive buff to its drops and health
â€¢ Wither skeletons can one shot the player but can be one shot back as well as having drop changes and a big speed boost
â€¢ Pigmen have more health and always one shot anything that hurts them but move slower
â€¢ Nether fortress chests have been buffed

# Extra Edition

â€¢ Bat has more health. Drops leather and sticks
â€¢ Creeper runs faster, has a bigger blast range and can drop rare or unobtainable item
â€¢ Donkeys and mules are faster
â€¢ Guardians have more health and drops more items
â€¢ Llama spit cause 1000 attack damage
â€¢ The ocelot has 1000 hearts and 500 hearts if tamed. It can only be tamed with nether stars and it drops totem of undying and diamonds
â€¢ Silverfish has 10 hearts and they drop stone and cobblestone
â€¢ Slime and strays have more health and drop more items
â€¢ TNT, TNT minecarts and ender crystals have a bigger blast range and the ender crystal has 10 hearts
â€¢ Cows, horses, sheep, pigs, mooshrooms, rabbits, polar bears, chickens and llamas drop 3 times the amount than what they used to
â€¢ Armor items are likely to drop more often
â€¢ Chests have boosted loot

# Full Edition

â€¢ Combined all above features to one edition

# What's new in update 3?

â€¢ Tweaked spider
â€¢ Updated bonus chest

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the behavior pack
â€¢ Activate the pack you installed in your world settings

title: Mob Disguiser Addon (v1.1)
text:
This is an addon which lets you disguise as any of the mobs in Minecraft. Its primary use is for minigames with your friends. Itâ€™s not meant to be applied to a regular survival world as it removes some vanilla Minecraft features. You will get the best overview and experience by playing in third-person mode.

# How does it work?

â€¢ Long press on the mob or press the Hide button that appears when you are near a mob.

As long youâ€™re disguised you will be able to control any direction where to go and you are also immune to damage and canâ€™t be seen by hostile mobs.

If you want to disguise as a hostile mob then you can sneak to become invisible to their AI.

# Notice

Important: Your name tag is by default visible above the mob. You can hide this text by applying the Hide Player Names Pack. Make sure itâ€™s prioritized above the Mob Disguiser behavior pack.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings

All leaves except for birch and jungle leaves change colors, but that is going to be updated in a future release.

title: Project Optimize Pack (v2)
text:
This texture pack project aims to strip away all of the unneeded graphics in Minecraft and optimize the in-game FPS to the maximum effort possible. This is especially useful when PVPing. Itâ€™s unknown at this point how much a difference it actually does but it sure makes certain things easier. For example, ores have been redesigned to be easier to find.

# All Features

â€¢ Pumpkin has a new face texture when wearing it, doesnâ€™t have the black side bars
â€¢ Water is clearer
â€¢ Glass blocks and glass panes are clearer
â€¢ Ores are outlined so that they are easier to spot
â€¢ Made the leaves more transparent
â€¢ Shortened grass and tall grass so that the player can see better
â€¢ Fire blockâ€™s cross shaped
â€¢ Color map for dirt, leaves and foliages are the same
â€¢ Removed all particles except for potion particle (due to invisible players would be 100% invisible otherwise)
â€¢ Removed polys on some mobs to reduce lag like cow horns and utters, pigs 3D snout, pigmens hat mask, sheep outer head, wither boss middle bone thingy, bats tail, chickenâ€™s red thingy
â€¢ Made llamaâ€™s spit one big square

# What's new in v2?

â€¢ Cleaner armor
â€¢ Removed weather particles like snowflakes and rain
â€¢ Made the top of the logs the same as the side
â€¢ Sun and moon look rounder
â€¢ Removed clouds
â€¢ End sky brighter
â€¢ Stained glasses with color

# How to activate it

â€¢ Download and install the resource pack
â€¢ Activate the pack you installed in Settings (Settings > Global resources)

title: More Totems Addon
text:
This addon implements 9 new and functional totems as well as 7 other totems which are used for trading. In addition, thereâ€™s also the new Taron villager which can be found spawning in villages and he sells everything around totems.

# How to get them?

There are two possible ways to access the totems:

â€¢ Kill an Evoker Illager â€“ He has now the chance to drop one of the ten totems (including the Totem of Undying)
â€¢ Find a Taron Villager â€“ He is an expert on the topic of totems. He needs resources to craft the new totems though. Dresses like a cleric.

You can also use the following command to receive the items: /give @p yellow_flower 1 [number from 0 to 15]

# The New Resources

Using these new totems, the Taron can craft a Combined Totem. Hand over two Combined Totems and some Totem Flowers to Taron and he\â€™ll craft you a Mixed Totem, the base ingredient for all other totems.

â€¢ Ordinary Green Totem â€“ Dropped by Zombies
â€¢ Ordinary Red Totem â€“ Dropped by Magma Slimes
â€¢ Ordinary Purple Totem â€“ Dropped by Endermen
â€¢ Ordinary Blue Totem â€“ Dropped by Squids and Elder Guardians
â€¢ Totem Flower â€“ Can be used to craft yellow dye, replaces dandelions and spawns naturally in your world

# The New Totems

All new totems are active when you hold them in your main hand. Due to technical limitations it is not possible to hold them in your offhand. [MT = Mixed Totem]

â€¢ Totem of Fire â€“ Crafting: MT & Magmablocks | Immunity to fire damage
â€¢ Totem of Air â€“ Crafting: MT & Feathers | Immunity to fall damage
â€¢ Totem of Water â€“ Crafting: MT & Prismarine Shards | Immunity to drowning damage
â€¢ Totem of Magic â€“ Crafting: MT & Spider Eyes | Immunity to damage through potions
â€¢ Totem of Withering â€“ Crafting: MT & Wither Skull | Immunity to wither damage
â€¢ Totem of TNT â€“ Crafting: MT & TNT | Immunity to explosion damage
â€¢ Totem of Projectiles â€“ Crafting: MT & Bow | Immunity to projectile damage
â€¢ Totem of Food â€“ Crafting: MT & Steak | Immunity to starving
â€¢ Totem of Flight â€“ Crafting: MT & Dragon Egg | No gravity while holding it
â€¢ Totem of Undying â€“ Crafting: MT & Emeralds | Saves you from dying

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings

# How to get them?

You can only get these items from zombies. Zombies now have the potential to drop a zombie brain, zombie eye (both new items) or one of the 9 lightsabers. But itâ€™s only zombies which actually hold a lightsaber which can drop them, but the chance of them dropping them is rare.

In case you just want to play around with the new items, you can use the command below to get them.

â€¢ /give @p yellow_flower 1 [enter a number between 1-11]

There are 4 tiers of lightsabers:

â€¢ Standard: +7 hearts, +0.03 speed, 15 damage
â€¢ Common: +8 hearts, +0.04 speed, 17 damage
â€¢ Rare: +9 hearts, +0.05 speed, 18 damage
â€¢ Epic: +10 hearts, +0.06 speed, 20 damage

title: Better Armor Addon
text:
This addon consists of three separate packs. One of them is a resource pack and the other two are behaviors packs which will change the way you play Minecraft. The common denominator of the packs is that all of them focused on improving the armor sets in Minecraft.

# How does it work?

These are the bonuses you obtain by wearing a full armor set for any of the following armors. (Assuming youâ€™ve got the Armor Bonuses Pack enabled.)

By enabling the Balanced Armor Pack you will also get bonuses while wearing a full armor set. But this pack applies the bonuses for wearing worse armor. All bonuses are based of the Armor Bonuses Pack. Only the speed values have been readjusted. In addition, leather diamond and iron chain switches their bonuses.

The Better Leather Pack resource pack changes the model and textures for the leather armor set. Now with more brown pieces after dying your armor.

# Leather Armor

â€¢ 0.03 Speed
â€¢ +3 Hearts
â€¢ +1 Attack Damage
â€¢ Immune to fall damage
â€¢ New mode and textures

# Gold Armor

â€¢ -0.01 Speed
â€¢ +5 Hearts
â€¢ +2 Attack Damage
â€¢ Immune to damage through potions

# Chainmail Armor

â€¢ +4 Hearts
â€¢ +4 Attack Damage
â€¢ Immune to fire damage

# Iron Armor

â€¢ +0.005 Speed
â€¢ +7 Hearts
â€¢ +3 Attack Damage
â€¢ Immune to projectile attack damage

# Diamond Armor

â€¢ +0.01 Speed
â€¢ +10 Hearts
â€¢ +5 Attack Damage
â€¢ Immune to explosion damage

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior packs and resource pack in your world settings

Naruto is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Masashi Kishimoto. It tells the story of Naruto Uzumaki, an adolescent ninja who searches for recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village.

Boruto is a spin-off of and sequel to Masashi Kishimoto's Naruto, and follows the exploits of Naruto Uzumaki's son Boruto and his ninja team while following a path to follow once they grow up.

title: Nostalgia-Craft Alpha PE (v1.8.1)
text:
This texture pack aims to recreate the design which existed back in the alpha version of Minecraft. Itâ€™s a much brighter theme of colors and also sounds have been replaced with the old ones. Perhaps some of you want to experience how Minecraft looked like in the early days. This pack will take you on a nostalgic trip back to the year of 2010.

The texture pack makes the world look much more brighter than what it looks like with the default Minecraft PE texture pack which exists for the latest Minecraft version.

Itâ€™s recommended to turn off Smooth Lighting for maximum effect.

title: A Proper Apocalypse Addon
text:
This addon is suitable for older players who want a new and more challenging experience in Minecraft. Lots of zombies will spawn during the daytime and occasionally a zombie pigman will spawn as well in the Overworld. Find out if you have what it takes to survive in a zombie apocalypse.

# Features

â€¢ Lots of zombies spawn during the day, and occasionally zombie pigmen spawn as well. Itâ€™s extremely challenging according to Sirconol.
â€¢ Zombies do not burn during the day. However, they do have both less health and attack damage.
â€¢ Husks spawn rarely during the day. Husks also drop bows since spiders spawn less frequently.
â€¢ Witches will now throw potions and summon skeletons. Skeletons do not burn in the day and use their former comrades as weapons. These witches played with magic they do not understand and are suffering the consequences. Their necromancy experiments started the apocalypse, yet they still do necromancy.
â€¢ Deserts are almost entirely zombie free. And different biomes have different amounts of zombies spawning.
â€¢ The night is more safe than during the day. Much less zombies spawn during the night. So sleeping is a catch 22. Do you want the grace period or do you want to set your spawn?
â€¢ Strays melee attack and walks slower.
â€¢ Skeletons are faster.

# Known Issue

Lag. After doing /kill @e a few times the amount of drops would lag their device. The device was of a low end model so if you have a low end device keep this in mind (iPad mini 2).

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the behavior pack
â€¢ Activate the behavior pack in your world settings

Wearing a spacesuit gives you several additional benefits (see below). And if you donâ€™t wear one youâ€™ll have just 7 hearts and decreased movement speed.

â€¢ Space Jumpsuit â€“ No knockback

â€¢ As the space suit replaces the leather armor it can be dyed in any color. All youâ€™ll need for that is a cauldron, some dyes and water.

title: The Vampires Addon
text:
The Vampire Addon introduces a few new mobs and items to the game. The mobs include three new vampires which are extremely dangerous. All of them are hostile toward any friendly beings they come across. However, they do have a weakness and thatâ€™s the daylight. So a great recommendation is to avoid the night and only go out during the day.

# Vampires

â€¢ Vampire Source (Zombie): Increased health, attack damage and speed.
â€¢ Vampire (Husk): Increased health damage and speed.
â€¢ Vampire Villager (Zombie Villager): Same stats as the source. Use a Potion of Weaknes and the Healing Star (Nether Star) to cure it.

# Items

â€¢ Healing Star (Nether Star): Used for curing vampire villagers. Obtained by killing the Forbidden Boss (replaces the Wither Boss).
â€¢ Vampireâ€™s Cape (replaces Elytra): Dropped by vampires.

# Storyline

There are legends that dark and strange things rest in the deepest parts of the forest. Some people in a tribe called Shugaruhkadoo do rituals for the powerful and legendary red-eye man with two big teeth. â€œThe Vampire sha-la-lam!â€

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install both behavior and resource pack
â€¢ Activate the packs you installed in your world settings

title: Astronomic Expansion Addon (v1.1)
text:
* This add-on only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

This add-on implements a ton of custom tools, items, blocks and weapons to the game. Most of the items have completely new and magical features. A great part is that it doesnâ€™t replace any of the vanilla items!

# How to obtain the new items?

The Astronomic Items can be obtained by trading with an Astronomer or the Magician. Both of which are new villager types spawning in villages.
All of them can be found spawning in villages.

â€¢ Astronomer
â€¢ Magician
â€¢ Jeweler
â€¢ Advanced Weaponsmith
â€¢ Jeweler Weaponsmith

You can also use the following text chat command to obtain the items: /give @p yellow_flower 1 [1-15]

# Astronomer Villager

â€¢ Star Powder â€“ The Astronomer can craft multiple of them into a Fallen Star. It can be used on zombies to turn them into Galactic Zombie bosses.
â€¢ Fallen Star â€“ Base ingredient for all other items.
â€¢ Star Sword â€“ Deals 10 attack damage and boosts your health and speed.
â€¢ Shield â€“ You canâ€™t die while holding this item. However, youâ€™re speed is drastically decreased.
â€¢ Umbrella â€“ Reduces your gravity while holding it. This means you wonâ€™t die from fall damage.
â€¢ Fire Amulet â€“ Immune to fire damage while holding it.
â€¢ Elytra Starter â€“ Launcher you into the air if you jump while holding it. Switch to another item to stop the boost.
â€¢ Panic Necklace â€“ Speed boost while holding it.

# Magician Villager

â€¢ Vampire Potion â€“ Hold the item in your hand when itâ€™s night to turn into a vampire! (+3 hearts, +2 damage, increased speed)
â€¢ Werewolf Potion â€“ Hold the item in your hand during the night to turn into a werewolf! (Night: +5 hearts, +4 attack damage, increased speed & saturation. Day: -2 hearts)

# The following items are sold by one of the new villager types

â€¢ Explosion Amulet â€“ Immune to explosions
â€¢ Magic Amulet â€“ Immune to potion damage
â€¢ Light Shield â€“ Immune to knockback effect
â€¢ Golden Feather â€“ Immune to fall damage
â€¢ Golden Air Bubbles â€“ Immune to drowning damage

# Machines sold by one of the new villager types

â€¢ Sieve
â€¢ Villager Spawner
â€¢ Star Powder Generator
â€¢ Chunk Loader
â€¢ Jeweler Machine

# Other Useful Info

â€¢ Jewels (ruby, amethyst, emerald, sapphire, ordinary jewel, dark jewel)
â€¢ Steel Nuggets
â€¢ Hammers, daggers, battleaxes, swords â€“ for every type of jewel the vanilla tool materials, steel & prismarine (lots of new items as a result of it)
â€¢ Parrots drop colored features (fitting to their color)
â€¢ Witches drop magic potions
â€¢ Creepers drop souls
â€¢ Squids drop air bubbles
â€¢ Zombies drop villager souls
â€¢ Give shackles to a villager to turn them into weaponsmiths, shackles are dropped by skeletons
â€¢ Use an Empty Extract Bottle to capture the Life Essence of wolves and bats
â€¢ Give a villager a Star Flower to turn him into an Astronomer
â€¢ Give a villager Star Powder to turn him into a Magician
â€¢ Polar Bears drop Polar Bear Fell
â€¢ Ocelots drop Ocelot Fell
â€¢ Vindicators drop Corrupted Souls
â€¢ Baby Zombies drop Corrupted Flesh
â€¢ Endermen drop Corrupted Hearts
â€¢ Fiery Potion â€“ Trade this item in combination of Corrupted Souls, Corrupted Flesh OR Corrupted Hearts to craft a Sword Effect Pigmen (available: damage, health, speed)

# How to find the Astronomer Villager?

You don't want to search the Astronomer Villager?
Use the command "/give @p yellow_flower 1 [1-17]" and "/give @p yellow_flower 1 [9-43]" to get the newly added items.

# Installation:

Install the resource pack as a Global Resource Pack in your game settings. This will enable the possibility for custom loading messages and splashes.
The behavior pack can be installed just like every other behavior pack.
A Tutorial World is included in this download and installs automatically. Play this world before getting into the survival action!

text:

title: Modern Decorations Addon
text:
This is an addon for all of you builders out there who want to expand their amount of blocks which they can use for decorative purposes. It adds a total of 42 new blocks and none of them will replace any of the used blocks in-game. The blocks are best suitable for modern builds since they include things such as a TV and an oven.

# How does it work?

You can obtain the modern decoration blocks by trading with a builder. The builder is a new type of villager.
Itâ€™s also possible to obtain the blocks by using the following text commands:

â€¢ /give @p sandstone 1 [3-12]
â€¢ /give @p stone 1 [7-12]
â€¢ /give @p fence 1 [6-15]
â€¢ /give @p planks 1 [6-15]

Here is a list of all the new blocks:

â€¢ New variants for andesite, granite and diorite
â€¢ 16 new types of wool (for each color)
â€¢ 10 new fences (matching the wool colors)
â€¢ New stone block known as Basalt
â€¢ Basalt comes in multiple different variants such as ore, pillar, chiseled and smooth
â€¢ Lots of new decorative blocks such as a TV, shelves, an oven and more

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings

title: RoboCraft Addon

â€¢ Use key (shears) to ride and control it, or to make it stop moving

# How to ride and control

â€¢ Long press on the robot and press "Ride" button
â€¢ Then open the inventory and add the key (shears) to the saddle slot

# How to Install

â€¢ Install the behavior pack first, and then select and install one of the resource packs you want.

you can also obtain them by using commands. You wonâ€™t be able to find them in the creative inventory.

title: Tokyo Ghoul V4 Addon
text:
Tokyo Ghoul is a Japanese dark fantasy manga series by Sui Ishida.
Tokyo Ghoul is set in an alternate reality where ghouls, individuals who can only survive by eating human flesh, live among the normal humans in secret, hiding their true nature to evade pursuit from the authorities. Including enhanced speed, senses, and regenerative ability, a regular ghoul is several times stronger than a normal human, has a skin resistant to ordinary piercing weapons and has at least one special predatory organ called a "Kagune", which it can manifest and use as a weapon during combat. Another distinctive trait of ghouls is that when they are excited the color of their sclera in both eyes turns black and their irises red.

This is the fourth version of Tokyo Ghoul addon.
If you are a fan of tokyo ghoul, it is the perfect add-on for you!

â€¢ Custom Sounds (The sounds are in beta phase, only 8 characters have sounds)

â€¢ Kaneki, Touka, Hinami and Nishiki will help you to beat other ghouls and researchers but if you attack, they clearly attacked you.
â€¢ Kaneki, Touka and Nishiki when killed become Ghouls so much care.
â€¢ Ayato will become a ghoul by night and is very dangerous.

â€¢ The Ghouls Remaining are mobs hostile so be careful.
â€¢ Sometimes Touka,Nishiki and Hinami and Kaneki Are fighting so spawnea one for that not to fight between them.

title: Mob Upgrades Addon
text:
This add-on upgrades most of the hostile mobs and also few friendly ones making them more dangerous to players. But also some behaviors between mobs have also been slightly altered balance their powers with their alliances. If you are looking to increase the difficulty of the game and making it more hardcore then this add-on is a good option for that.

# Features

â€¢ Arrows guarantees 4 damage per hit (applies to mobs using bows and players).
â€¢ Faster arrows.
â€¢ Skeletons attach range distance increased to 60 blocks. They also have a slightly increased accuracy.
â€¢ Strays fire arrows in bursts (four arrows at the time). Slowness effect: you get hit, slowed down and then you are even easier to get hit.
â€¢ Strays and skeletons drops at least 1 arrow, but usually more.
â€¢ Blazes shoot a two round burst of Ghast fireballs (slow interval).
â€¢ Horses spawn naturally with greater speed. Their jump height remains the same. Health is increased. Max is 30 hearts. They are also aggressive and will attack any mob other than other horses. But their attack range is low, just 1 block.
â€¢ Wolves are unstoppable killing machines and will kill monsters and sheep. They have 50 hearts, deals 20 damage, immune to fire. But as a result of their incredible strength you now need to tame them with diamonds.
â€¢ Creepers cause bigger explosions. But they are now afraid of wolves.
â€¢ Zombie Pigmen and Wither Skeletons spawn with iron swords.
â€¢ Zombies no longer burn in daylight

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the behavior pack
â€¢ Activate the behavior pack you installed in your world settings

title: DayZ Addon (v2)
text:
This addon takes some of the apocalyptic elements in DayZ which is a popular survival game for PC and brings them to Minecraft.

# Mobs

The Infected (zombies, zombie pigmen, husks) are both strong and fast and this makes them the most serious threat in the Overworld.

â€¢ Zombie (Infected)
â€¢ Zombie Pigman (Military Infected)
â€¢ Husk (Super Infected)

The Bandits (strays, wither skeletons and skeletons) are best to be avoided since they are usually equipped with an assault rifle and will shoot players on sight.

â€¢ Skeleton (Normal Bandit)
â€¢ Wither Skeleton (Melee Bandit)
â€¢ Stray (Strong Bandit)

The Survivors (replace villagers) are always available for trading and they are under constant threat by the infected.

â€¢ Villagers (Survivors)

Stray Dogs have replaced wolves and can be tame with Dog Food (bone).

â€¢ Wolf (Stray Dog)


# Items

â€¢ Throwing Knife (Snowball): This one has a good chance for a knockback effect and it also deals some damage.
â€¢ Grenade (Egg): A high powered grenade.
â€¢ Makarov Pistol (Ender Pearl): Deals some good damage but it has a short cooldown between each use.
â€¢ AK47 (Fishing Rod): Hard to aim with but deals quite a lot of damage.
â€¢ M4A1 (Bow): Good aim but not as powerful as the AK47. You need M4A1 mags (Arrows) to use it.
â€¢ Homemade Molotov (Bottle oâ€™ Enchanting): Throwable explosive which causes fire.
â€¢ Green Camouflage (Iron Armor)
â€¢ Leather Armor (Diamond Armor)
â€¢ Plastic Armor (Golden Armor)
â€¢ Canned Food (Mushroom Stew)
â€¢ Dog Food (Bone)
â€¢ Morphine (Golden Apple), Concentrated Morphine (Enchanted Apple)

# Changes in Version 2

â€¢ Added Homemade Molotovs (explosive and causes fire)
â€¢ Added Dog Food
â€¢ Added Canned Food
â€¢ Survivors carry all kinds of different items which they trade.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install both behavior and resource pack
â€¢ Activate the packs you installed in your world settings

title: Marine Addon
text:
The Marine Addon is the first functional boat add-on for Minecraft. It includes a sailboat, a jet ski and a speed boat and each of them exist in three different colors. The controlling mechanism is slightly different for each boat but the core functionalities are basically the same. Add-ons are still quite limited and that means some things such as the movement system isnâ€™t perfect.

# How to ride?

â€¢ To get on the boat, long press on the boat and hit the "Ride" button.
â€¢ To control it, hold Paddles (carrot) /Key (carrot on a stick)

# Boats

â€¢ Sailboat: Drive with paddles, replaces vindicator
â€¢ Speed Boat: Drive with key, replaces ghast
â€¢ Jet Ski: Drive with key, replaces creeper

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install one of the McAddons
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings

title: Birds Addon
text:
This add-on includes a new bird in the game called a toucan. More birds will most likely be added as soon as the bird mechanics have been improved (based on suggestions provided by you good folks). The toucan is a really cute bird which can be found mostly everywhere flying around. Itâ€™s actually the only existing bird which can fly currently. Itâ€™s halfway finished and so far it includes options for two different colors.

# Features

â€¢ Replace chickens
â€¢ Drops raw toucan meat, 1-8 feathers
â€¢ Can be leashed
â€¢ Ability to fly
â€¢ Good toucans lay normal eggs (50%)
â€¢ Bad toucans lay rotten eggs (50%)

â€¢ Download and install one of resource packs
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack you installed in your world settings

title: Odd Mobs Addon
text:
The Odd Mobs Addon changes some of the hostile mobs abilities to make them a bit more interesting. If youâ€™ve played Minecraft for a long while then this is definitely a nice refreshment and also a way to slightly increase the difficulty of the game. One really cool feature is that creepers have finally come to their senses and will now drop TNT bombs instead of instantly dying.

# Features

â€¢ Zombies have double health and deals a bit less attack damage.
â€¢ Skeletons canâ€™t burn in sunlight and are hostile towards wolves to avoid getting eaten by them.
â€¢ The Wolf health is doubled and so is the attack damage.
â€¢ Wither Skeletons have been debuffed by making their status effect poison.
â€¢ Creepers drop TNTs when at a certain proximity of their target.
â€¢ Blazes are basically flamethrowers and their health is decreased.
â€¢ Ghasts are neutral.
â€¢ Endermen have 10 health but they can teleport every second.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the behavior pack
â€¢ Activate the pack you installed in your world settings

title: Battered Old Stuff Textures

This add-on adds the Tron Bikes (also known as Light Cycles) from Tron (which is a science-fiction movie) to Minecraft. Itâ€™s basically a futuristic motor bike which can be used to drive at incredible speeds. Itâ€™s really the most amazing to use during the night because of the luminous stripes which are located on the sides of the bike and around the wheels. As a whole, itâ€™s a really cool vehicle with an amazingly realistic model and textures.

Some of the mobs are much faster than their original speed. For example, the villager will run like crazy. Replace your horse with a villager, cow or maybe even a creeper!

title: Danger Inbound: Meltdown Edition
text:
Danger Inbound: Meltdown Edition Addon

Toxic rivers, a fiery moon and mutated monsters are the first few signs of a world turning to hell. Most of the Overworld (and other dimensions) have been turned into a nightmare. The night creatures are much more powerful and there are also new monster types with new abilities. Everyone have a desperate desire to live, but only a few of you will. Even friendly mobs have realized the evil of (some) humans and will escape them at any cost.

The Nether and the End have also been infected by the same evil virus.

Can you survive in a world like hell?

text:

If you are lucky you might get lots of valuable items but sometimes something much worse happens such as the wither boss spawning.

# How does it work?

Pigs are replaced by lucky blocks. That means you will be able to find find them spawning in most biomes in the Overworld. Every time that you destroy a lucky block something random happens.

title: The Human Addon
text:
* This add-on only works with Minecraft PE version 1.1 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.1 or higher before downloading.

The Human Addon turns some of the previous hostile mobs into humans who are now on the players side. This means that they will protect players instead of trying to harm them. This is their default behavior and as a result there is no taming involved. If one of these humans notice that a player is in danger, maybe getting attacked by a zombie, then they will come to their assistance.

# Features

â€¢ The Human Summoner (replaces Evoker) has a few different types of attacks and some of which include fang attacks and summoning fairies.
â€¢ The Fairy (replaces Vex) is a small, flying human (somewhat similar to an angel) which can be summoned by The Human Summoner.
â€¢ The Alchemist (replaces Witch) throws poisonous potions at hostile mobs. This applies for all hostile mobs, even ones which arenâ€™t a direct threat to the player.
â€¢ The Archer (replaces skeletons) is armed with a bow. They look completely different to a skeleton but their behaviors are fairly similar (except that they are friendly toward players).
â€¢ The Caster (replaces strays) is a magician who have the ability to shoot shulker projectiles at hostile mobs.
â€¢ The Warrior (replaces wither skeletons) is the strongest human. He will never hesitate to engage in battle if he sees it necessary.
â€¢ The Smith (replaces zombie pigmen) is armed with a tomahawk. Heâ€™s one of the stronger humans and neutral towards players.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings

The wrestlers include Kane, The Undertaker, John Cena, Randy Orton and Brock Lesnar. All of them replace hostile mobs which will fight one another (and players). Included is also a referee but he wonâ€™t do anything, but his presence definitely makes the match seem more realistic.

The Laser Projectiles Addon changes most (but not all) projectiles to behave more similar to laser. It shoots straight forward and can travel an infinite distance or until it collides with an entity or a block. It was primarily created to provide map makers an easy way to implement this feature for minigames or similar.
The llama is a domesticated South American camelid, widely used as a meat and pack animal by Andean cultures since the Pre-Columbian era.

Since this is the first version it doesnâ€™t include all of the recipes but itâ€™s definitely a good start.

# How to view the recipes?

To be able to use the RecipeBook you first need to make sure that you are using the Classic UI profile. Open Settings, Video and then find the UI Profile options in the advanced video settings.

Use a crafting table or a furnace to access the recipe book. At this point it only includes a couple of recipes but more will hopefully be added in the next addon update.

The excrete (meaning poop) can be picked up and then thrown at other entities to make them sick. Sure, itâ€™s not the most dignifying way to treat someone, but it is for sure effective.

This addon replaces one of the mobs in-game with a wither demon boss. It can fly, move through walls and also shoot dangerous projectiles at players. title: Sheeptastic Addon
text:
Sheeptastic! is really a fantastic addon which makes sheep more useful. Youâ€™ll be able to use them for things such as a riding mount or as a cute, harmless pet. And if you really wanna try your chances then you can summon the Black Sheep and fight your (probably first ever) boss battle against a huge sheep.

# Mount

1. Throw a splash potion of strength at a sheep
2. Feed it a brown mushroom
3. Saddle it using a saddle

You can control it with any type of hoe.

# Pet

1. Throw a splash potion of weakness at the sheep
2. Feed it a red mushroom

To tame it you will need to feed it some hay bale.

# Familiar

To upgrade a sheep to â€œFamiliarâ€ it must be a pet (tamed sheep).

1. Feed it an enchanted apple to upgrade the sheep.

A Familiar sheep will protect you against hostile mobs and will do a total damage of 15 damage.

# Black Sheep (Boss)

1. Throw a splash potion of strength at a sheep
2. Feed it a brown mushroom
3. Feed it a ghast tear
4. Throw a splash potion of strength
5. Throw a splash potion of weakness
6. Feed it some coal

It will turn into a boss known as the Black Sheep. It will spit large fire charges. It attacks anything it sees except for squids.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the behavior pack
â€¢ Activate the pack you installed in your world settings

Tap the pictures below to preview how it works

This add-on replaces one of the mobs in-game with a Ferrari 458 Italia which is a mid-engined Italian sports car.
To drive a car, press down your finger on the screen and move towards the car.
To control it, you need a key that replaces the carrot on a stick.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install both behavior and resource pack.
â€¢ Activate the packs you installed in your world settings.

title: SilverMines Texture Pack
text: The texture pack holds a touch desperate look towards comic style but carries the role playing game when used. It carries a special aura behind is walls which motivates you again and again to activate this pack into your game.

title: CLDR Shader
text: CLDR is a realistic cloud shader with waving plants, trees, and water. Similar to SSPE Shaders( Perfect for PvP ? ) More reduced lag than other shaders with good fps. It comes with a different font letter and background images, too.

title: World Animal Add-on (v1.1)
text:
World Animal is an addon that includes 17 types of animals, each animal has its own behavior and sounds, it is possible to tame and ride, you have to be careful with some wild animals.

# Elephants

The elephant replaces the pigs with the one you can mount in the with just putting a saddle, besides that also you can store things like a safe.

â€¢ Peaceful (does not attack player or other mobs) 
â€¢ It will be fed with sugar to have pups. 
â€¢ You can store things like a safe.

# Tigers and tigers white

The tiger replaces the cows and cows mushroom are wild animals and is aggressive with any animal and player that has it serca.

# Turtles

Turtles replace ocelots when you find a turtle is going to be tame with fish or watermelons when this domesticated becomes a ninja turtle.

â€¢ Pacific (do not attack mobs or player) 
â€¢ Domesticable (33% probability) 
â€¢ It is domesticated with melon and fish

# Crocodile

Crocodiles replace the zombie husk are dangerous and aggressive animals

â€¢ Not domesticable 
â€¢ Drop: lizard skin 

When you kill a crocodile you will loose your lizard skin with that you can make a lizard armor.

# Pandas

Pandas are very cute animals that can help you defend against aggressive mobs, the pandas replace the wolves.

â€¢ Domesticable (33% probability) 
â€¢ It is going to be domesticated with sugar cane. 
â€¢ Neutral (if the player hits the panda he will start attacking) 

# Giraffes

Giraffes replace the endermans are neutral animals and you can defend yourself from wild animals like lions.

â€¢ Not domesticable 
â€¢ Drop: giraffe skin 

When you kill a giraffe you will loose your skin with that you can make a giraffe armor.

# Normal Snake

The snakes replace the spiders are very dangerous and if the annoying ones attack and poison you.

â€¢ Neutrals (will attack if you hit them) 
â€¢ Domesticate (33% probability) 
â€¢ Damage: 6 attack and poison efect 30 seconds
â€¢ It is domesticated with any raw meat

# Dangerous Snakes

The snake replaces the cave spiders unlike the other snake this is very aggressive and it is not possible to tame .

â€¢ Aggressive (attack player) 
â€¢ Not domesticable 
â€¢ Damage: 5 attack and poison effect 50 seconds 

# Lions

The lions replace the creepers is known as the king of the jungle

â€¢ Neutral (attack the player if you hit him and attack other animals) 
â€¢ Domesticable (medium lions only) 
â€¢ Is domesticated with meat and fish

The domesticated lion will defend the mobs player.

# Zebras

Zebras are harmless animals replace donkeys and mules and have the same characteristics as a horse and can be attacked by wild animals.

# Ostrich (Available from Minecraft PE Version 1.1)

The ostrich are a species of birds that do not fly if it is not a broker.

â€¢ Replace the llamas
â€¢ Tameable with wheat (adult only)

# Dolphin

Dolphins are marine animals, harmless and tender that you can find in the temples of the ocean.

â€¢ Replace Guardians

# Pink dolphin

The pink dolphins are ocean animals with a pink skin, they are bigger than the blue dolphins, they are in the oceans.

â€¢ Replaces the elderguardian

# Leopard

Leopards are very dangerous carnivorous animals, they can attack anyone who is in their way.

â€¢ Replaces skeletons
â€¢ Tameable with any type of meat (only baby)

# Black Panther

Black panthers are very dangerous carnivorous animals, they can attack anyone in their path, they identify with black hair.

â€¢ Replaces the Wither skeletons
â€¢ Tameable with any type of meat (only baby)

# Duck

Ducks are a kind of small birds that do not fly and are easy in your minecraft world.

â€¢ Replaces chickens

# Penguin

Penguins are birds that do not fly are very tender living in the snow biomes and are possible to tame to protect you from monsters or other animals.

â€¢ Replace stray
â€¢ Tameable with fish and salmon (only baby)

# What have been updated in version 1.1?

â€¢ Added Leopard, Black Panther, Duck, Penguin, Dolphin and Ostrich.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack you installed in your world settings

title: Mythic Mobs Addon (Updated)
text:
This addon replaces 6 mobs with mythical monsters. All of the mobs are hostile during all hours of the day except for the werewolf which only turns dangerous during the night. The mobs look really frightening and is a really good addition to the game if you want a complete new set of mobs to fight!

# What has been changed?

â€¢ Berserker (Wither Skeleton)
â€¢ Crossbone (Stray)
â€¢ Reptilian (Husk)
â€¢ Magician (Skeleton)
â€¢ Werewolf (Iron Golem)
â€¢ Chimera (Creeper)

Tap the pictures below to preview how it works.

# What have been updated in this version?

â€¢ Added a new mob called Chimera (replaces creepers)
â€¢ Custom egg textures
â€¢ Custom sounds

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings.

title: Remote Controlled Aircraft Addon
text:
This is an addon which lets you experience to fly a remote controlled aircraft. You will be seated outside the aircraft and it will look as if you are controlling it using a remote control.

# Features

â€¢ The chicken is replaced by a toy aircraft.
â€¢ Throw some petrol cans (snowballs) at the aircraft to make it start flying.
â€¢ Hold a remote control (carrot on a stick) and long press on the aircraft to be controlled

# Notes

â€¢ In this add-on, the toy aircraft can fly because of the levitation effect.
â€¢ So you should not set your difficulty to peaceful.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install both behavior and resource pack.
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack you downloaded in your world settings.

title: Invisible Particles Texture Pack
text:
Getting a good screenshot after youâ€™ve drunk a potion is close to impossible, but with this texture pack you wonâ€™t have a problem since they are removed from appearing. Another great time itâ€™s useful is when you drink an invisibility potion. You will no longer have to worry about enemies notice you because of the particles (assuming everyone have the pack installed).

Tap the picture below to watch a short video. Both of them drank the Postion of invisibility, but we can see that something is different.
If he was not holding a sword, he could be perfectly invisible.

title: Project Aura Texture Pack
text:
Project:Aura is a revamped Minecraft that adds brand new vibrant colored biomes and trees. The idea behind Project Aura is to give a adventurey feeling while making it eerie and creepy. I intend to add fantasy and difficult to this Project as a whole but as of now I release this resource pack. Expect a behavior pack soon as well as a updated resource pack! :D

Twitter: @Cixon64

title: Rectangular Texture Pack
text:
Many simple or simplistic resource packs use different geometrical shapes such as squares, like in CubeBlocks or Swirl Craft. As you have seen from the title, in Rectangular Pack  will be used rectangles. This creates a cartoon effect, although visually the gameplay and atmosphere of the game will be similar to traditional.

This texture pack was originally designed for PC version by Nicky_Troll_123, and ported to PE.

title: Tokyo Ghoul V3 Addon
text:
Tokyo Ghoul is a Japanese dark fantasy manga series by Sui Ishida.
Tokyo Ghoul is set in an alternate reality where ghouls, individuals who can only survive by eating human flesh, live among the normal humans in secret, hiding their true nature to evade pursuit from the authorities. Including enhanced speed, senses, and regenerative ability, a regular ghoul is several times stronger than a normal human, has a skin resistant to ordinary piercing weapons and has at least one special predatory organ called a "Kagune", which it can manifest and use as a weapon during combat. Another distinctive trait of ghouls is that when they are excited the color of their sclera in both eyes turns black and their irises red.

This is the third version of Tokyo Ghoul addon.
If you are a fan of tokyo ghoul, it is the perfect add-on for you!

# What have been updated?

â€¢ Rize and Hinami ghouls have been redesigned
â€¢ Eto, Nishiki and Yamori Jason ghoul added.
â€¢ Custom sounds and names
â€¢ And more

â€¢ Creeper : Amon (can be tamed with diamond)
â€¢ Skeleton : Uta
â€¢ Wither Skeleton : Jason
â€¢ Zombie Pigman : Shuu Tsukiyama
â€¢ Iron Golem : Ayato
â€¢ Enderman : Rize
â€¢ Creeper : Amon
â€¢ Husk : Hinami
â€¢ Cow : Nishiki
â€¢ Eto : Iron Golem
â€¢ Spider : Yamori

# Items

â€¢ Masks & Armors
â€¢ Weapons
â€¢ Foods

And much more, I hope you enjoy it.

If you like this add-on, tap on the name of the creator at the top to visit the creator's YouTube channel.

â€¢ Activate the packs you installed in your world settings

text:

They existed from about 4.8 million years ago until just 3,700 years ago.
Mammoths were of equal size and in some cases superior to modern elephants.

â€¢ Replaces polar bear
â€¢ Attacks the player and the species Smilodon

# Smilodon (v0.1)

The most distinctive feature are its huge canines, which make it one of the most popular prehistoric mammals.

# Compsognathus (v0.2)

For decades, Compsognathus was famous for being the smallest known dinosaur; Collected specimens are about one meter long.

Includes sounds and modifications in some items.

title: LIIE's Textures PE
text:
Unlike some other resource packs which focus on changing only a few elements of Minecrafft, LIIEâ€™s Resource Pack makes everything in the game look different, from the grass in the dirt to the armor you wear when fighting against other players and monsters. Actually, the armor designs are pretty nice, especially the detailing on the core of the iron armor and the change in colors for diamond gear. Fans of Final Fantasy will immediately see that the swords look much bigger and thicker than normal, bringing to mind the iconic buster sword from the seventh game in the series.

This texture pack was designed for PC version and ported to PE.

title: The New World Addon
text:
This add-on recreates Overworld and other dimensions into a whole new world.

# Basic Features

â€¢ The bow is now a long-range rifle, with it's own sounds.
â€¢ The End and Nether both have been consumed in blue, as well as their portals.
â€¢ The water, grass and leaves are all more vibrant in color, fire and lava is blue.
â€¢ There are ally and enemy mobs, which the player must identify, as some may aid the player in battle, while some are set on destruction.
â€¢ Most mobs have buffs of some kind.
â€¢ Villagers are now male and female, and have altered trades.
â€¢ New background and Minecraft logo on main menu.

# TO DEFEAT THE DRAGON

Collect several Ender Pearls, stacks even, and after destroying all the End Crystals, get to the highest tower. Use the rifle and time your shot to land where the upper back is, (where the wings and neck meet), do this and even try using TNT when close to defeat the Mega Dragon!

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install both behavior and resource packs
â€¢ Activate the packs you installed in your world settings.

title: Tokyo Ghoul Addon V2
text:
Tokyo Ghoul is a Japanese dark fantasy manga series by Sui Ishida.
Tokyo Ghoul is set in an alternate reality where ghouls, individuals who can only survive by eating human flesh, live among the normal humans in secret, hiding their true nature to evade pursuit from the authorities. Including enhanced speed, senses, and regenerative ability, a regular ghoul is several times stronger than a normal human, has a skin resistant to ordinary piercing weapons and has at least one special predatory organ called a "Kagune", which it can manifest and use as a weapon during combat. Another distinctive trait of ghouls is that when they are excited the color of their sclera in both eyes turns black and their irises red.

This is the second version of Tokyo Ghoul addon.
Most ghouls have been redesigned. And masks, armors, weapons, and items added.
If you are a fan of tokyo ghoul, it is the perfect add-on for you!

# Characters

â€¢ Zombie, Stray : Kaneki Ken
â€¢ Villagers : Kaneki, Hide, Touka, Hinami
â€¢ Witch : Touka
â€¢ Creeper : Amon (can be tamed with diamond)
â€¢ Skeleton : Uta
â€¢ Wither Skeleton : Jason
â€¢ Zombie Pigman : Shuu Tsukiyama
â€¢ Iron Golem : Ayato
â€¢ Enderman : Rize
â€¢ Creeper : Amon
â€¢ Husk : Hinami

text:

â€¢ $50 = orange dye

â€¢ Soda = water bottle

# How to make a vending machine?

It's from 2 droppers, 1 hopper, 1 chest and 1 button.
To make the machine, dig down 2 blocks, place 1 chest then 1 hopper, place 1 dropper facing backward then, place 1x dropper on top facing forward and then place 1 button on the top hopper then fill the top dropper with food.

title: Dirt Bike Tracks
text:
Kidsource Dirt Bike Tracks map

Driversâ€¦..start your engines! Get ready for some epic racing action with this collection of tracks from Kidsource. Just grab this map, grab your favorite vehicle addon, and letâ€™s go racing!

There are four tracks available to test your skills.

# Road Course

The road course is perfect for challenging your friends. It comes complete with a starting gate, so everyone gets a fair start.

# Off-road Course

The off road course is laid out in the sprawling flat lands. Weave your way through the hay bales, or ride outside the lines and explore the world!

â€¢ Oval Track

The oval track is a stock car style short track. It features flat banking in the turns, a pit area, and even a starters flag stand.

â€¢ Stunt Arena

The stunt arena is a great place to hone your racing skills. It features stunts to improve steering and jumping.

So whatever type of racing you prefer, this Kidsource Dirt Bike Tracks map will fit the bill!

title: NoMorePeaceFulMobs Addon
text:
* Updated: Feb 17, 2017

NoMorePeaceFulMobs addon removes peaceful mobs from the game by making them die every time they spawn. This addon is not that useful, but it can be useful if you on a server and want all mobs disabled.

You can tap the picture below to preview how it works.

There are two versions of this addon.

â€¢ Behavior Pack 1 : All peaceful mobs die every time they spawn.
â€¢ Behavior Pack 2 : Unlike other mobs, pets do not die.

With the Behavior Pack 2, ocelot and wolf can be tamed without dying.

# Notes

â€¢ Shulkers will still spawn, (It will be fixed soon.)
â€¢ Also if you apply the addon after creating the world, mobs already on the world will still be there until you kill them.

If you like this addon, you can follow @BaxterblueYT on Twitter.
You can also tap the button at the top to visit the creator's YouTube channel.

â€¢ Download and install the resource pack above.
â€¢ On the first screen of the Minecraft PE, select "Settings > Global Resources".

Hope you like it.

title: Null Add-on
text:
This add-on adds the scary minecraft creepypasta to the game name "Null".

Not as well known as the infamous Herobrine, Null is regarded as one of minecraft's 'ghosts'. There are three entities recognized as Minecraft's 'ghosts': Herobrine, Null, and Entity303.

title: Herobrine VS Entity 303
text:
Herobrine is the subject of a community-made creepypasta. He is one of the major community icons of Minecraft. Herobrine has not been present in any version of Minecraft.
Entity 303 (nicknamed "303") is a creepypasta commonly said to be "the New Herobrine". According to the pasta, a former Mojang employee was fired by Notch

This add-on is based on the herobrine and entity 303 myths.
And it was also made by modifying Herobrine and Notch Addon by Sprintermax.

# Herobrine

â€¢ Herobrine replaces Wither Skeleton.
â€¢ He is a little stronger than Entity 303.
â€¢ He has a diamond sword.

# Entity 303

â€¢ Entity 303 replaces Iron Golem.
â€¢ To spawn him, you need 4 iron blocks and 1 pumkin as picture below.
â€¢ He can power-up by using a Nether Star.

title: MarvelCraft Addon
text:
MarvelCraft is an addon for Minecraft Pocket Edition that has various features. It has iconic weapons such as thor's hammer (Mjolnir) which causes lightning, spiderman's webshooters, deadpool's katana, hawkeye's bow and more! It also has iconic characters such as Starlord, Wolverine, Mystique, Venom and even the Chitauri as enemies/mobs! You can also dress up as Deadpool, Iron Man, Spiderman and even Captain America.

# Armors

â€¢ Chain Armor : Deadpool
â€¢ Iron Armor : Iron Man
â€¢ Diamond Armor : Captain America
â€¢ Golden Armor : Spiderman

# Weapons

â€¢ Bow : Repulsor beams (Iron Man)
â€¢ Fishing Rod : Shield (Caption America)
â€¢ Snowball : Mjolnir (Thor)
â€¢ Iron Sword : Katana (Deadpool)
â€¢ Ender Pearl : Teleportation
â€¢ Egg : Gun (Black Widow)
â€¢ Bottle o' Enchanting : Bow (Hawkeye)

Tap on the picture below to see how it works.

# Villagers

When they are attacked, they start fighting.

â€¢ Starlord
â€¢ Thor
â€¢ Black Widow
â€¢ Doctor Strange
â€¢ Wolverine
â€¢ Cyclops

â€¢ Zombie : Venom

Have fun!

title: Elephant Add-on

Elephants are large mammals of the family Elephantidae and the order Proboscidea. Two species are traditionally recognised, the African elephant and the Asian elephant.

title: Tokyo Ghoul Addon
text:
Tokyo Ghoul is a Japanese dark fantasy manga series by Sui Ishida.
Tokyo Ghoul is set in an alternate reality where ghouls, individuals who can only survive by eating human flesh, live among the normal humans in secret, hiding their true nature to evade pursuit from the authorities. Including enhanced speed, senses, and regenerative ability, a regular ghoul is several times stronger than a normal human, has a skin resistant to ordinary piercing weapons and has at least one special predatory organ called a "Kagune", which it can manifest and use as a weapon during combat. Another distinctive trait of ghouls is that when they are excited the color of their sclera in both eyes turns black and their irises red.

This addon includes

â€¢ 7 different ghouls
â€¢ 5 main characters
â€¢ 1 character of the people in the briefcase

# Characters

All of my guesses. Please tell me if it's wrong.

â€¢ Creeper : Amon (can be tamed with diamond)
â€¢ Enderman : Rize
â€¢ Zombie Pigman : Shuu Tsukiyama
â€¢ Skeleton : Nashiro Yasuhisa
â€¢ Stray : Kaneki Ken
â€¢ Wither Skeleton : Uruka Minami
â€¢ Zombie : Tatara
â€¢ Husk : Touka Kirishima

And much more, I hope you enjoy it.

# Notes

â€¢ Tap on the picture below to preview how the ghoul will attack you. (1.3+ version required)

title: NoMoreEnderCrystal Addon
text:
NoMoreEnderCrystal is a addon that removes End Crystals so they don't explode. It makes it so End Crystal disappear extremely fast and makes them not explode, even if you spam it.

title: Ant World Add-on (Update)
text: The Ant World Add-on makes all of the mobs in Minecraft a lot smaller. They are really not much larger than an ant and their health and strength have been severely reduced to fit their size. In their eyes you will probably look like a giant, or maybe even a god.

title: Llama Add-on (Update)
text:
This addon contains a quite fun animal with a unique set of behaviors. That is Llama.
The llama is a domesticated South American camelid, widely used as a meat and pack animal by Andean cultures since the Pre-Columbian era.

# Features

â€¢ Llamas replaced pigs
â€¢ Theyâ€™ll spit at wolves and creepers
â€¢ If You breed two llamas by feeding them each some wheat, theyâ€™ve made love a baby llama will spawn.
â€¢ Place a carpet on the back of a llama to be able to ride them.
â€¢ Then hold a carrot on a stick in your hand to control the direction.
â€¢ Hold a carpet in your hand, long press on the llama and press Saddle to ride it.
â€¢ A saddled llama can carry your items

â€¢ White, Gray, Creamy, Brown

title: Crazy Wither Boss
text:
Meet the cute and crazy wither boss.
The Wither Boss in this addon is not the same as usual. If the wither boss attacks the mobs or the player with the head, it can be healed or damaged. Take a look! How does it look? It's crazy!

The Wither Boss will not spawn naturally in the game, but you can build a wither boss yourself.

# How to make?

You can do it the same way you originally created it.

1. Create a "T" out of Soul Sand by placing one block on the ground and then three across the top.
2. Place the three Wither Skeleton Skulls on top of the Soul Sand "T", one on each block. As soon as you place the last Skull, the Wither will be summoned.

title: RPG HUD
text:
This addon shows the RPG-style HUD on the Minecraft game screen.

A head-up display or heads-up display, also known as a HUD, is any transparent display that presents data without requiring users to look away from their usual viewpoints. 

RPG(Role-playing game) is a game in which players assume the roles of characters in a fictional setting.

â€¢ Red bar : health
â€¢ Blue bar : Hunger
â€¢ Gray : Armor

Also, the coordinates where you are located are displayed.

# Notes

â€¢ Map used in screenshot : Hunger Games Forest Arena
